code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{personalData}from'../../data/personal';import SectionTitle from'../../components/SectionTitle/SectionTitle';import Button from'../../components/Button/Button';import'./BlogPreview.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlogPreview=()=>{const recentPosts=personalData.blogPosts.slice(0,3);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"blog-preview",id:"blog",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SectionTitle,{title:"Latest Blog Posts",subtitle:"Thoughts and insights"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-grid",children:recentPosts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"blog-date",children:post.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:post.excerpt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-meta",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:post.readTime})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/blog",className:"read-more",children:"Read More \u2192"})]})},post.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-cta",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/blog",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",children:"View All Posts"})})})]})});};export default BlogPreview;
